Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of  New York, in relation to developing a comprehensive program for the remediation and reuse of brownfields.

Items.Title: Resolution finding that the enactment of Proposed Int. No. 21-A does not have a significant adverse impact on the environment and is consistent with The State Environmental Quality Review Act.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Finding that the enactment of Proposed Int. No. 21-A does not have a significant adverse impact on the environment and is consistent with The State Environmental Quality Review Act.

Items.Title: Resolution finding that the enactment of Proposed Int. No. 21-A does not have a significant adverse impact on the environment and is consistent with The State Environmental Quality Review Act.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Finding that the enactment of Proposed Int. No. 21-A does not have a significant adverse impact on the environment and is consistent with The State Environmental Quality Review Act.
